channel.title: [Deathlypvpz] Npc drops - Dungeoneering items [PI]
channel.description:
Okay so I tried adding primal drops to an npc on deathlypvpz v4.1 (PI) and once I'd added them to npcdrops.tsm saved, restarted server killed the npc I got this error in the run.bat and I'm pretty sure it has something to do with dungeoneering items being outside of dungeoneering. I could just put // before the entire section at line 3096 at npchandler.java but wont that mess up my dungeoneering? Really need help with this, its probably an easy fix but Im not quite sure what id do. :confused:
EDIT: It doesn't happen when i spawn the npc in game :/ EDIT2: Fixed it
Under [code] if (npcs[i].isDead == true) {[/code] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/w6w7ko.jpg[/img]
I removed [code]public void handleDungeoneeringDrops(int i)[/code]

item.title: [Deathlypvpz] Npc drops - Dungeoneering items [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

Remove what you did, it should go back to normal.

Read full topic
